original_title: Thuë pihi kuuwi – Uma Mulher Pensando
overview: A Yanomami woman watches a shaman prepare the Yãkoana, food for the spirits. Based on the narrative of a young indigenous woman, the Yãkoana that feeds the Xapiri and allows shamans to enter the world of spirits also proposes a meeting of perspectives and imaginations.
title: Thuë pihi kuuwi – Uma Mulher Pensando
